name: Boutique Caeleste
description:
A departed soul finds herself trapped in the limbo of purgatory. Can your boutique help her find peace and finally guide her lost soul to the afterlife? Navigate lost memories filled with secrets of a storied past. Sometimes, for a troubled soul, the path to the afterlife requires not only an adept soul guide, but the appropriate accouterments.

Credits:

Skylar (@skyesongss): Art, Narrative, Itch Packaging

Annika (@superkleta1): Art, Narrative, Production

Miriam (@illuxions): Dialogue, Narrative, Programming

Alexa (@alexabanuelos): Main Programming
